text: Theory of a Deadman is a Canadian rock band from North Delta, British Columbia. They were formed in 1999. The band is currently signed to Roadrunner Records as well as 604 Records. The band includes traits of music styles, such as country and acoustic, in addition to their post-grunge and alternative rock foundation. title: Theory of a Deadman
